schools.name: Wingate Elementary School
schools.school-summary: Wingate Elementary School, a public school located in Shiloh, IL, serves grades PK-5 in the Mascoutah Community Unit School District 19.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 8 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
schools.rating-description: The GreatSchools Rating helps parents compare schools within a state based on a variety of school quality indicators and provides a helpful picture of how effectively each school serves all of its students. Ratings are on a scale of 1 (below average) to 10 (above average) and can include test scores, college readiness, academic progress, advanced courses, equity, discipline and attendance data. We also advise parents to visit schools, consider other information on school performance and programs, and consider family needs as part of the school selection process.

schools.name: Shiloh Elementary School
schools.school-summary: Shiloh Elementary School, a public school located in Shiloh, IL, serves grades PK-3 in the Shiloh Village School District 85.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 5 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.

schools.name: Shiloh Middle School
schools.school-summary: Shiloh Middle School, a public school located in Shiloh, IL, serves grades 4-8 in the Shiloh Village School District 85.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 7 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
